sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-admin-panel', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], template: `

Admin Panel

User Management

Manage users, roles, and permissions

Channel Management

Create and manage channels

Security

Monitor security and access logs

Analytics

View usage statistics and reports

Recent Activity
User Action Time Status
John Doe Created new channel 2 minutes ago Success
Jane Smith Updated user permissions 15 minutes ago Success
Mike Johnson Deleted message 1 hour ago Warning
System Alerts
High memory usage detected
Backup completed successfully
All systems operational
`, styles: [] }) export class AdminPanelComponent {}
